title: A lo kalin a lo kalin
lyrics:
A lo kalin, a lo kalin,
A lungmawi lawr turin;
Lung mawi zawng zawng,
Lung man tamte,
A hmangaih, a ta.

Vana Arsite angin,
A lallukkhum timawiin;
Ropui takin an eng ang;
A lallukhum atan.

A lawrkhawm ang,
a lawr khawm ang,
A rama dah turin;
A fim zawng zawng,
a eng zawng zwang,
A hmangaih, a ta.

Naupang tete, naupang tete,
Isua hmangaihtute-
Chung lungmawi man tam chu an ni,
A hmangaih, a ta.
